sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
This action can be used when there is a scenario to launch approval from multiple groups in parallel. - Approval: Required from at least one person from each group. - Rejection: Anyone from the provided groups can reject
Input: List of Groups Output: Approval rule, that can be used in an approval action
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Parallel Approval Rule

sys_hub_step_ext_input.name: var__m_sys_hub_step_ext_input_9cd928fe832cf210932c5529feaad3aa

sys_hub_step_ext_output.label: Approval Rules
sys_hub_step_ext_output.name: var__m_sys_hub_step_ext_output_9cd928fe832cf210932c5529feaad3aa

sys_hub_action_input.label: Approval Groups
sys_hub_action_input.name: var__m_sys_hub_action_input_9aa864fa832cf210932c5529feaad332

sys_hub_action_output.label: Approval Rules
sys_hub_action_output.name: var__m_sys_hub_action_output_9aa864fa832cf210932c5529feaad332

sys_hub_action_output.label: Action Status
sys_hub_action_output.name: var__m_sys_hub_action_output_9aa864fa832cf210932c5529feaad332

sys_hub_action_output.label: Don't Treat as Error
sys_hub_action_output.name: var__m_sys_hub_action_output_9aa864fa832cf210932c5529feaad332
